rows.label: tev001795_MSG0001
rows.name:
Okay, let's see... So my first advisory session was
about the Prone's cultural heritage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0002
rows.name:
The next concerned the Orphe's food reserves,
followed by the Nopon discussing their special
education program.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh, [ST:playername ]! I'm sorry.
I didn't see you there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0004
rows.name: I was a little preoccupied with my own thoughts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0005
rows.name:
I've been awfully busy lately, now that I have xenoforms
coming to speak with me as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001795_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask Hope whether it has been
hard not having Ornella around.

rows.label: tev001795_JNK0020
rows.name: Advise

rows.label: tev001795_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest that Hope make a numbered list of priorities.

rows.label: tev001795_JNK0030
rows.name: Invite

rows.label: tev001795_SEL0031
rows.name: Invite Hope to visit your pet at the barracks.

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0006
rows.name:
Not having Ornella around certainly hasn't made things
any easier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0007
rows.name:
But I started all this myself, so I should be able to
continue it by myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0008
rows.name: Really, this is exactly the way things should be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0009
rows.name:
And since I decided to proceed using my own methods,
it hasn't been that bad at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0010
rows.name: You're probably right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0011
rows.name:
Some of these issues will take a fair amount of time
to fix.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0012
rows.name: And some are certainly more urgent than others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0013
rows.name:
I should prioritize the ones that are the most urgent,
followed by those which can be solved quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0014
rows.name: Thank you for the advice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0015
rows.name:
Being able to organize it all like that makes me feel a
little bit better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0016
rows.name: Er, while I have you here, can I tell you something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0017
rows.name: That's very kind of you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0018
rows.name:
While I appreciate the offer, I'm afraid I won't be
able to take you up on it at the moment.
I still have so much work to do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0019
rows.name:
When I need a break, however, you can be sure I'll be
there with bells on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0020
rows.name:
A little time with your pet should be just the thing to
lift my spirits and reinvigorate me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0021
rows.name:
But if you have a moment, I'd like to bend your ear
about something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0022
rows.name:
As you know, we humans have received a great many
benefits from our unions with the xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0023
rows.name:
I would like to repay them for all the knowledge and
technology that they've given us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0024
rows.name:
By talking with them, I've come to learn a lot about
their ways, and also taught them about ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0025
rows.name:
The closer our peoples become, the better the world we
can create together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0026
rows.name: I firmly believe that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0027
rows.name:
You in particular have become especially popular with
the xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0028
rows.name:
And while I want to continue being of help to you,
I'd also like to see what I can accomplish by myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001795_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'm really excited to show you what I can do.
Just you wait and see![ST:wait ]
